attributes.action: Provide government funding to the RSPCA & other similar British charities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is an absolute disgrace that our government does not provide any funding whatsoever to a very fine cause of assisting in the prevention of cruelty to animals.

Judging by the utterley ridiculous areas that certain amounts of hard earned tax payers money has been given to in the past, not providing funding to the RSPCA is absolutely appalling.

The RSPCA and any other registered British charity within the same field should without a doubt receive much more financial assistance from our governing power.

Animal cruelty is a terrible area of our every day/way of life and should be backed up in every way in order to prevent it.
